unnormalised: Komser, mhojem vaidyaki bill sodanch kiteak ek phone number bhaxen dista? Ru. 9876543210! Hanv soput gheun sangtam, fattim ek pavtt mhak ek shink aili, taka mhak ru. 5000 kharch ailo. Ani "consultation fee" vishim kitem sangchem - 10 mintam khatir ru. 2500? Mhozo chai wala jivitacho updhesh dita takaith thodde duddu gheta! Mhaka dista hanv mhojem ek kidney vikun he bill bhortolem. Konnak zai asa? Fokot 30 vorsam vaparlem, mint condition. ₹ 70,00,000 cher charcha korunk zata.
normalised: Kom, mhojem medical bill kiteak telephone number bhaxen dista? Rupee nou arab atth sattar kotti panchasht lakh tretalish hozar donxem dha! Hanv soput gheun sangtam, poilea pavtt hanv shinklo tedna mhaka rupee panch hozar kharch ailo. Ani "consultation fee" vixim sangonkuch naka - dha minuteank rupee don hozar panchxem? Mhojem chai wala jivitachem updesh dilearui thodde poixe gheta! Mhaka dista mhaka atam kidney vikun hi bill bhortole poddtoli. Konnak zai asa kai? Fokot tis vorsam vaparun ghelya, ekdom bori condition asa. Rupee satt million-ancher bhav kortolim.
text: Komser, mhojem vaidyaki bill sodanch kiteak ek phone number bhaxen dista? Ru. 9876543210! Hanv soput gheun sangtam, fattim ek pavtt mhak ek shink aili, taka mhak ru. 5000 kharch ailo. Ani "consultation fee" vishim kitem sangchem - 10 mintam khatir ru. 2500? Mhozo chai wala jivitacho updhesh dita takaith thodde duddu gheta! Mhaka dista hanv mhojem ek kidney vikun he bill bhortolem. Konnak zai asa? Fokot 30 vorsam vaparlem, mint condition. ₹ 70,00,000 cher charcha korunk zata.
